name: CognitiveFunctionPersonReported
title: Cognitive Function  Person Reported
description: Assessment of the person's cognitive function as reported by the person/family member/unpaid caregiver using a validated scale (Business ID: Entry 611476)
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values addresses terms representing Cognitive Function  Person Reported.),(Data Element Scope: The intent of this set of values is to identify patients who have a/an assessment of the person's cognitive function as reported by the person/family member/unpaid caregiver using a validated scale.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes LOINC codes for Cognitive Function  Person Reported.),(Exclusion Criteria: Terms not representative of observable encoded terms that may have values indicating Cognitive Function  Person Reported.)

Everyday Cognition - Study Partner Report Form [ECog.Partner]
Compared to 10 years ago, has there been any change in thinking things through before acting [ECog.Partner]
Compared to 10 years ago, has there been any change in cooking or working and talking at the same time [ECog.Partner]
Compared to 10 years ago, has there been any change in the ability to concentrate on a task without being distracted by external things in the environment [ECog.Partner]
Compared to 10 years ago, has there been any change in returning to a task after being interrupted [ECog.Partner]
Compared to 10 years ago, has there been any change in the ability to do two things at once [ECog.Partner]
Compared to 10 years ago, has there been any change in using an organized strategy to manage a medication schedule involving multiple medications [ECog.Partner]
Compared to 10 years ago, has there been any change in keeping mail and papers organized [ECog.Partner]

Compared to 10 years ago, has there been any change in thinking ahead [ECog.Partner]

Compared to 10 years ago, has there been any change in finding his or her way around a familiar store [ECog.Partner]

Compared to 10 years ago, has there been any change in finding one's car in a parking lot [ECog.Partner]
Compared to 10 years ago, has there been any change in reading a map and helping with directions when someone else is driving [ECog.Partner]
Compared to 10 years ago, has there been any change in following a map to find a new location [ECog.Partner]
Compared to 10 years ago, has there been any change in understanding spoken directions or instructions [ECog.Partner]
Compared to 10 years ago, has there been any change in describing a program he or she has watched on TV [ECog.Partner]
Compared to 10 years ago, has there been any change in remembering the meaning of common words [ECog.Partner]

Compared to 10 years ago, has there been any change in forgetting the names of objects [ECog.Partner]

Compared to 10 years ago, has there been any change in remembering he or she has already told someone something [ECog.Partner]
